TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NgramHashExtractingTransformer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A transform that turns a collection of tokenized text (vector of ReadOnlyMemory) into numerical feature vectors using the hashing trick.
